articles.title: Sydney Sweeney: Actress calls producer shameful over comments on looks and acting - BBC.com
articles.description: The actress responds to Hollywood producer Carol Baum saying: "She's not pretty, she can't act."

articles.title: Harry Potter actor Warwick Davis pays tribute to wife Samantha who died aged 53 - BBC.com
articles.description: The Harry Potter actor describes his wife Samantha as his "favourite human" after she dies aged 53.

articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: Box Office: Vampire Thriller ‘Abigail’ Tries to Take a Bite Out of ‘Civil War’ With $12 Million Debut - Variety
articles.description: "Abigail" will fend off two other new releases at the weekend box office.
articles.content:
Talk about nepo babies. “Abigail,” a blood-sucking thriller about the daughter of Dracula, arguably the most famous vampire in history, is poised to lead at the domestic box office.
The R-rated movi… [+3300 chars]
